summary: Samoa is an island country in Polynesia, made up of two main islands and several smaller ones. It was known as Western Samoa until 1997. The Samoan people have a rich history, settling the islands over 3,500 years ago and developing their unique language and culture. Samoa is a democratic country and a member of the Commonwealth. It gained independence in 1962 after being a German colony and then under British and New Zealand rule. The capital is Apia.
title: Samoa
